block.p: UNION MINIERE S.A., Brussels, a zinc refiner, plans to buy the shares it does not already own of the Laser Power Corp., San Diego, a designer of laser optics, for $38.7 million in cash.

LINDBERG CORP., Rosemont, Ill., the largest commercial heat treater in North America, said its board rejected a cash buyout proposal of $9 a share, a total of $44 million, from a big shareholder, Ira Sochet of Miami.
